document.full_text: one protester was shot dead during a second day of clashes between police and demonstrators in southeast turkey after a dozen kurdish politicians were barred from contesting a national election.
document.title: man shot dead in kurd protests over turkey poll ban
lines_and_colors: one protester was shot dead during a second day of clashes between police and demonstrators in southeast turkey after a dozen kurdish politicians were barred from contesting a national election.
